## Produces() function

Defines the response type(s) that the methods can produce or tzpe of body id full request or events are requested

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Produces(producesDef: ResponseType): (_target: RESTClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
